'''Court of Justice's Conscientiousness''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Court of Justice's Conscientiousness is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in southern [[Beryl Region]], after riding [[The Miraculous Antoine Roger Aircraft]].
